text: Mulungu walonjeza ena a inu amene akhulupirira ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino kuti adzawasandutsa kukhala olowa m’malo padziko monga momwe adasandutsira anthu amene adalipo kale iwo asanadze. Ndipo Iye adzawapatsa mphamvu yoyendetsa chipembedzo chawo chimene adawasankhira. Ndithudi Iye adzawapatsa m’malo mwake chitetezo chokwana atawachokera mantha ngati iwo andipembedza Ine ndipo sandiphatikiza ndi china chilichonse. Ndipo onse amene sakhulupirira atamva izi ndi ochimwa
